com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. OPTIONAL {?s dcterms:description ?desc}. FILTER (!BOUND(?desc)). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: description is a required property for datasets
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: no description defined for this dataset

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. ?s dcterms:description ?o. FILTER (!isLiteral(?o)). BIND(dcterms:description AS ?p). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: dataset description should be a literal

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. ?s dcterms:title ?o. FILTER (!isLiteral(?o)). BIND(dcterms:title AS ?p). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: dataset title should be a literal

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. OPTIONAL {?s dcterms:title ?title}. FILTER (!BOUND(?title)). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: title is a required property for datasets
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: no title defined for this dataset

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s ?p dcat:Dataset. ?s rdf:type ?o. ?s dcterms:publisher ?agent } GROUP BY ?s HAVING (count(?agent) > 1)
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: a dataset should not have more than one publisher
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: dataset can only have one publisher

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. OPTIONAL {?s dcterms:publisher ?publisher}. FILTER (!BOUND(?publisher)). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: publisher is a recommended property for datasets
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: no publisher defined for this dataset

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. OPTIONAL {?s dcat:keyword ?keyword}. FILTER (!BOUND(?keyword)). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: keyword is a recommended property for datasets
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: no keyword defined for this dataset

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. OPTIONAL {?s dcat:theme ?theme}. FILTER (!BOUND(?theme)). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: theme is a recommended property for datasets
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: no theme defined for this dataset

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. OPTIONAL {?s dcat:theme ?theme}. FILTER (!BOUND(?theme)). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: distribution is a recommended property for datasets
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: no distribution defined for this dataset

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX adms:<http://www.w3.org/ns/adms#> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. OPTIONAL {?s adms:contactPoint ?cPoint}. FILTER (!BOUND(?cPoint)). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: contactPoint is a recommended property for datasets
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: no contactPoint defined for this dataset

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Distribution. OPTIONAL {?s dcat:accessURL ?url}. FILTER (!BOUND(?url)). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: access URL is a required property for distribution
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: no access URL defined for this distribution

OPTIONAL {?s dcterms:description ?desc}. FILTER (!BOUND(?desc)). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }

OPTIONAL {?s dcterms:format ?format}. FILTER (!BOUND(?format)). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: format is a recommended property for distribution
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: no format defined for this distribution

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Distribution. OPTIONAL {?s dcterms:license ?license}. FILTER (!BOUND(?license)). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: format is a recommended property for distribution
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: no format defined for this distribution

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s rdf:type dcat:Distribution. ?s ?p ?o. ?s dcterms:format ?o } GROUP BY ?s HAVING (count(?agent) > 1)
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: a distribution should not have more than one format
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: distribution can only have one format

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s rdf:type dcat:Distribution. ?s ?p ?o. ?s dcterms:license ?o } GROUP BY ?s HAVING (count(?agent) > 1)
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: a distribution should not have more than one license
